category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_datamap_output_object_location
preference.preference_description: Defines the folder where data map will place the output root item revision. The Valid Values: * "Newstuff": the data will be in the user's"Newstuff" folder. This is the default value. * The UID of an alternative folder: For this, use the Rich client user interface through the Edit/Options panel. * "None": output objects will not be placed in any folder.
